name: YOUTH ORGANISATION ALEXIS PRILEP
goal:
How we work

Our activities of youth work is a way to encourage young people and young adults to gain self-confidence and capacity building with an educational purpose, providing them with mentoring, skills recognition and language support.

Goal

Our goal is to encourage the strengthening and recognition of the skills of young people in society through youth work education.

The educational set of young people improves with providing learning for personal and social competencies, cognitive and creative competent experiences that effectively reflects on their values, priorities and goals.

YOUTH ORGANISATION ALEXIS PRILEP is valuing diversity and inclusion.
interests: Budget, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives:
• Young people and decision-makers in a dialogue
• Active citizenship, democracy, solidarity and fundamental rights
• Civic and democratic participation of young people at EU level
• Equal opportunities, life perspectives and a sense of social purpose, freedom of expression and building peaceful communities
